name: Society of Mexican American Engineers and Scientists
description: The purpose of the MAES Latinos in Science and Engineering is to promote the professional and personal development of minorities pursuing degrees in engineering and science. We encourage the entrance of Mexican-Americans into higher education, provide academic assistance and growth opportunities in engineering and science. Providing scholarships and mentorship, networking and professional contacts, and fostering leadership skills to achieve this purpose. In addition, MAES provides a Mexican-American cultural atmosphere to enhance self-awareness, individual attention and unity while expanding the involvement and interaction of its members. The application of these personal and professional skills is combined to prepare MAES member for success.
